episode_summary: This episode covers a range of quirky and historical topics, including the ban on nudity in East Germany, the Beanie Baby craze and its impact on eBay, a unique moist towelette museum in Michigan, and a historical controversy in the Miss America pageant.

facts.fact: In 1954, it became illegal to bathe completely naked in East Germany.
In 1998, one-tenth of everything sold on eBay was a Beanie Baby.

Due to the interests of its production coordinator, Michigan State University's Planetarium not only dedicates itself to space science education, but also houses the world's only moist towelette museum.
72 years after the first Miss America contest, the runner-up was still claiming 'I won it, hands down.'
